languages.text: "Попытки следовать Лекс Империалис приносят больше вреда, чем пользы. Ты до сих пор этого не видишь?"
"Trying to adhere to the Lex Imperialis causes more harm than good. Do you still not see it?"
languages.original_text: "Попытки следовать Лекс Империалис приносят больше вреда, чем пользы. Ты до сих пор этого не видишь?"

traits.locale_text: "Attempts to adhere to the Lex Imperialis cause more harm than good. Do you still not see it?"
"Attempts to adhere to the Lex Imperialis cause more harm than good. Do you still not see it?"
"Trying to adhere to the Lex Imperialis causes more harm than good. Do you still not see it?"
"Trying to adhere to the Lex Imperialis causes more harm than good. Do you still not see it?"
"Trying to adhere to the Lex Imperialis causes more harm than good. Do you still not see it?"
"Trying to adhere to the Lex Imperialis causes more harm than good. Do you still not see it?"

languages.text: 「レックス・インペリアに従おうとすることが、善よりも害をもたらしているんだ。まだ分からないのか？」
languages.original_text: "Trying to adhere to the Lex Imperialis causes more harm than good. Do you still not see it?"

traits.locale_text: 「レックス・インペリアに従おうとすることが、善よりも害をもたらしているんだ。まだ分からないのか？」

languages.text: "Der Versuch, dem Lex Imperia zu folgen, verursacht mehr Schaden als Nutzen. Seht Ihr das immer noch nicht?"
languages.original_text: "Trying to adhere to the Lex Imperialis causes more harm than good. Do you still not see it?"

traits.locale_text: "Der Versuch, dem Lex Imperia zu folgen, verursacht mehr Schaden als Nutzen. Seht Ihr das immer noch nicht?"

languages.text: « Il devient évident que la Lex Imperialis cause plus de mal que de bien. Vous ne voyez donc pas ? »
languages.original_text: "Trying to adhere to the Lex Imperialis causes more harm than good. Do you still not see it?"

traits.locale_text: « Il devient évident que la Lex Imperialis cause plus de mal que de bien. Vous ne voyez donc pas ? »

languages.text: «Ceñirse tanto a la Lex Imperialis hace más mal que bien. ¿Es que aún no se da cuenta?».
languages.original_text: "Trying to adhere to the Lex Imperialis causes more harm than good. Do you still not see it?"

traits.locale_text: «Ceñirse tanto a la Lex Imperialis hace más mal que bien. ¿Es que aún no se da cuenta?».

languages.text: “凡事遵循帝国律法的教条，结果只会弊大于利，难道你还看不出来吗？”
languages.original_text: "Trying to adhere to the Lex Imperialis causes more harm than good. Do you still not see it?"

traits.locale_text: “凡事遵循帝国律法的教条，结果只会弊大于利，难道你还看不出来吗？”

languages.text: "Lex İmperialis'e bağlı kalmaya çalışmak yarardan çok zarar veriyor. Bunu hâlâ göremiyor musun?"
languages.original_text: "Trying to adhere to the Lex Imperialis causes more harm than good. Do you still not see it?"
